title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Singles Seeds Progress
text: May 9, 2018 / 10:24 PM / in 17 hours UPDATE 2-ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Singles Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 3 Min Read May 10 (OPTA) - Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000 / WTA Premier, Madrid Masters Men's Singles matches on Wednesday .. Seeds ..
